A man 

try :
   if fail == True :
      learn()
      repeat()
except:
   sleep()

I'm currently working as a Senior Software Engineer (Full-Stack) in Innovation Team at Societe Generale Bengaluru in the domain of Blockchain development, Full-Stack Web development, and Augmented Reality/Virtual Reality.

Before joining SocGen, I completed my undergraduate studies (B.Tech in Electrical Engineering) from the Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee. I'm a self-learned developer who started off by googling - "how to make a website" and was awestruck as the color of the text on the screen changed as I did what was instructed.

I'm an open-source enthusiast who've tasted different waters of software engineering - Web development to Machine Learning to Blockchain, all in chronological order. You can find me either binge-watching shows, listening to pop and progressive rock music, or surfing the tidal waves of the internet - primarily Reddit or HackerNews.
